metadata.title: CVE-2016-6621 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The setup script for phpMyAdmin before 4.0.10.19, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.10,and 4.6.x before 4.6.6 allows remote attackers to conduct server-siderequest forgery (SSRF) attacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.4+dfsg1-1').
